itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the opening week NFL games as well as the start of the Power 5 College Football schedule including all odds and Over/Unders that we love.  We also discuss how if the BIG TEN and PAC-12 don't play a normal fall season, they don't deserve to be considered for the National Championship.
